title: FSI Mandarin Chinese (Complete Course)
description:
This is a course in Mandarin Chinese, made by the Foreign Service Institute for the US Government and eventually released to the public. The course focuses on speaking and understanding, and is comprised of a series of audio lessons broken up into separate modules of study. Each module (except #9) has accompanying textbook and workbook pages that should be used to follow along with the lessons. There are no characters: reading and writing Chinese will have to be learnt elsewhere. This course has been pulled off of http://fsi-language-courses.org, and is in the public domain, free for all use. Compiled and uploaded by R0uge on 12 June 2009. Enjoy!
